At the same time, closely watch for pedestrians near the mixer and be ready in case they step onto the road. Our vehicle should cautiously pass the mixer when it is safe to do so, ensuring not to come close to the position of pedestrians. Given the presence of pedestrian crossing signs nearby, drivers should be vigilant for pedestrians who may cross the road, especially as the mixer's presence could make them harder to see. Our vehicle should also signal its intentions clearly and in advance to alert other road users of its intent to turn.
